author: Staff Reporter
text:
Senior MP of the Trinamool Congress (TMC) Idris Ali caused an uproar on Wednesday when he threatened to “break the spine” of a senior Communist Party of India (Marxist) leader.

Mr. Ali targeted senior CPI(M) leader Gautam Deb for questioning Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee’s integrity. “Mamata Banerjee will finally go to jail,” Mr. Deb had reportedly said earlier this week. “Who is Goutam Deb to send her to jail?” Mr. Ali said.

TMC leadership distanced itself from Mr. Ali’s comments. Describing them as “crass and unhealthy,” party spokesperson Derek O’Brien said they were “certainly not the views of the party.”

TMC has issued a show-cause notice to Mr Ali.
title: Trinamool MP threatens to break CPI(M) leader’s spine
